definition: callback if you want to validate something after selection.
callback if you want to inspect something before selection, return false if you want to cancel the selection. return true otherwise.
To be able to have selectable rows in grid.
definitions of columns as an array [], if not defines columns are auto-generated.
Column width of columns in grid.
Data being displayed in the grid.
disables text selection in the grid.
toggles whether row selection check boxes appear
enable or disable resizing of columns
enables the paging feature
enable row reordering.
For enabling/disabling sorting in grid.
filterText:the actual filter text so you can use external filtering while using the builting search box.useExternalFilter:bypass internal filtering for instance, server side-searching/paging
Defining the height of the footer.
Showing the footer is enabled by default
initial fields to group data by. array of strings. field names, not displayName.
Defining the height of the header row.
define a header row template for further customization.
Enables non-HTML5 compliant drag and drop using the jquery UI reaggable/droppable plugin. requires jqueryUI to work if enabled.
enable the jqueryUIThemes
prevent unselections when multi is disabled.
defaults to true when using *'s or undefined widths. can be ovverriden by setting to false.
set this to false if you only want one item selected at a time
pageSizes: page Sizes, pageSize: Size of Paging data, totalServerItems: how many items are on the server (for paging), currentPage: what page they are currently on
array of plugin functions to register.ke
Row height of rows in grid.
Define a row Template to customize output
array, if multi turned off will have only one item in array
set to true if you only want to be able to select with the checkbox only
enables display of the menu to choose which columns to display.
enables display of the filterbox in the column menu.
whether or not to display the dropzone for grouping columns on the fly
similar to filterInfo
set the tab index of the grid.
provide your own sorting function
DANGER: setting this to true will aloow the grid to update individual elements as they change. In large datasets this adversely affects performance. It is disabled by default.
